channel.title: Xor on warrick.io
channel.description: Recent content in Xor on warrick.io

item.title: xor
item.description: Note to self, stop rewriting these functions, you already have them: # xor string str with string ciph def xor(str, ciph) m = (str.size.to_f / ciph.size).ceil z = str.bytes.zip((ciph * m).bytes) z.map { |a| (a[0] ^ a[1]).chr }.join end # xor each byte in string str with byte def xor_each(str, byte) str.each_byte.map { |c| (c ^ byte).chr }.join endxor("aaa", "\x01\x01\x01") xor_each("aaa", 0x01)
